name: Mysteryville
summary:
Sinister things are happening in Mysteryville: all cats have disappeared from this little town. Young journalist Laura Winner starts to investigate this odd crime. Using her wits and courage she becomes a true detective and starts to discover all of Mysteryville’s secrets. She needs to traverse her way through 21 locations, interview the town’s residents, figure out their clues and find all the evidence that she’ll need to solve the mystery of the vanishing cats.

Mysterious puzzles, hidden object searches, and a funny adventure are waiting for you! This mysterious crime story and classic hidden object game will be appreciated by cats and kitten lovers!
